Key concepts I always remind myself of in Crypto:

- Discipline > intelligence.

- There‚Äôs beauty in simplicity.

- Opportunity is abundant. ‚ÄòLuck‚Äô is correlated to those who put themselves in positions for opportunity to find them frequently.

- Laziness is a disease.
